english:
I agree. It's very much a possibility the U.S. tries to take out Khamenei. And @SaeidGolkar and I wrote an essay during the 12-Day War describing potential scenarios if #Iran's regime's supreme leader was eliminated:
https://spectator.com/article/will-israel-kill-irans-supreme-leader-ayatollah-ali-khamenei/?edition=usâ€¦
Trump's comments to @politico on needing new leadership in Iran, and Khamenei's mindless baiting of Trump on X, lead me to believe that Trump is going to try to kill the Supreme Leader this week.

There will soon be a US carrier strike group in the Middle East, making it easier
